description.value: While you are in the stance provided by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Immovable Object], you ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain. Once per 10 minutes, if you Dismiss your Immovable Object stance, you can Stride as a free action. At the end of that Stride, your final footfall causes an explosion of energy. Each creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] takes @Damage[14d6[force]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|against:class|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC). Creatures that fail the save are also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].
